Welcome

Algae, a group of diverse photosynthetic eukaryotic organisms, are a prominent part of the marine food chain. There are different types of algae such as kelp and phytoplankton, which serve as a food chain base. Despite algae playing a large, beneficial role in the aquatic ecosystem, algae can also become a prominent threat.
